## What is in this for you?
1. Daily air quality measurements in New York, May to September 1973, including:
  
  +1a Ozone level at Roosevelt Island
  
  +1b Solar radiation at Central Park
  
  +1c Wind speed and maximum daily temperature at La Guardia Airport

2. Some analysis based on these measurements.
